title: WTB or WTT T206 Cycle 460 HOFer
author: David R

posts.post_title: WTB or WTT T206 Cycle 460 HOFer
posts.post_content:
I am looking for a Cycle 460 HOFer in SGC 30 or better.  I have a Cycle 460 SGC 10 Hughie Jennings (both hands) that I am trying to upgrade for my HOF backs collection.  Would trade or sell that one if anyone is interested as part of a deal.  Thanks and happy 4th.

David R.
